name: Bliss of Otherworld's Embrace
simple_desc: Inflicts Epiphany on all enemies. Affected enemies take more DMG in their turn, and their Arcana effect is regarded as Wind Shear, Bleed, Burn, and Shock effects. In addition, when their Arcana effect is triggered at the beginning of the next turn, the Arcana stacks are not reset. Deals Wind DMG to all enemies.
desc:
Inflicts Epiphany on all enemies for #2[i] turn(s).
Enemies affected by Epiphany take #3[i]% more DMG in their turn, and their Arcana effect is regarded as Wind Shear, Bleed, Burn, and Shock effects. In addition, when their Arcana effect is triggered at the beginning of the next turn, the Arcana stacks are not reset. The stack non-reset effect can be triggered up to #4[i] time(s) in Epiphany's duration, and its charges are replenished when Epiphany is applied again.
Deals Wind DMG equal to #1[i]% of Black Swan's ATK to all enemies.
